title: Enhancing System Design Practical Competencies: E-Learning Implementation and Management Project for Corporate Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and general computer literacy
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can create e-learning project proposals for science education by applying action research methodology.
Learners can explain a systematic project management process (planning-design-evaluation) for e-learning content development.
Learners can prototype science experiment simulation content using digital tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
